parsed.title: O Sangue de Simão: A Tortura que Criou um Mito Antijudaico
parsed.summary: Em 1475, o desaparecimento da criança Simão em Trento desencadeou uma farsa judicial alimentada por ambição política e preconceito religioso. Sob tortura, os judeus foram forçados a confessar crimes inexistentes, enquanto evidências de um acidente foram silenciadas. O mito se perpetuou por séculos, alimentando ódio e violência até os ataques modernos, mostrando como a manipulação da verdade pode transformar uma tragédia em propaganda mortal.

scenes.narration: A corda rangiu, apertando o pescoço de Samuel, enquanto inquisidores exigiam confissão sobre o sangue.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, close‑up of a rough rope tightening around a man's neck in a stone courtroom, candle flames flickering, cold shadows looming on stone walls
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the rope, candle flame gently flickering, shadows shifting across stone walls
scenes.audioDescription: Creaking rope under tension, distant murmurs of judges, echoing footsteps

scenes.narration: Em 1475, o menino Simon desapareceu, e a cidade já sussurrava acusações contra os judeus.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, narrow medieval alley at dusk, a small wooden toy abandoned on cobblestones, mist curling around the walls
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle pan left across the alley, dust particles drifting in the cold air
scenes.audioDescription: Distant church bells, wind whistling through narrow passage, faint echo of footsteps

scenes.narration: O bispo Hinderbach viu no caso oportunidade de enriquecer, confiscando bens da comunidade judaica.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, bishop's study illuminated by a single candle, Hinderbach holding a ledger of seized assets, golden coins glinting in shadow
scenes.motionDescription: Slow push‑in on the bishop's face, candle light wavering, coins subtly shimmering
scenes.audioDescription: Quill scratching on parchment, low murmurs of conspiratorial voices

scenes.narration: Testemunhas relataram que o pai da criança conversou com um vizinho cristão, sugerindo acidente.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, cramped prison cell with thin slit window, a weary man speaking to a guard, cold light slicing through dust motes
scenes.motionDescription: Subtle tilt up from the floor to the man's face, dust motes floating in stale air
scenes.audioDescription: Muffled voice, clanking of chains, distant guard footsteps

scenes.narration: Sob tortura de squassada, os judeus foram forçados a descrever rituais sangrentos macabros inexistentes.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, wooden torture platform with ropes, a trembling figure suspended, shadows stretching across stone walls
scenes.motionDescription: Camera circles slowly around the suspended figure, rope swaying gently, light flickering on the walls
scenes.audioDescription: Creaking wood, strained breaths, rope tightening sound

scenes.narration: A confissão, escrita com sangue da própria tortura, selou o destino dos inocentes eternos.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, parchment stained with dark blood, a trembling hand holding a quill, candlelight casting deep shadows
scenes.motionDescription: Slow zoom on blood‑stained ink pen moving across parchment, candle flame trembling
scenes.audioDescription: Ink scratching, subtle heartbeat rhythm, faint echo of distant chanting

scenes.narration: Quer conhecer toda a verdade sobre Simon de Trento? Inscreva‑se e descubra no The Gap Files.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black screen with faint glow, The Gap Files logo appearing in silver lettering, subtle mist surrounding the text
scenes.motionDescription: Static frame with faint fade‑in of logo, subtle mist drifting across the surface
scenes.audioDescription: Soft ambient drone fading into silence, gentle echo of a distant chime

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
